languages.text: "Вы увидите меня в нем, шерин. И вы увидите меня без него".
"You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."
languages.original_text: "Вы увидите меня в нем, шерин. И вы увидите меня без него".

traits.locale_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Me verá con él, shereen. Y sin él».
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: «Me verá con él, shereen. Y sin él».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你会看到我穿着它的样子，亲爱的，也会看到我脱掉它的样子。”
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: “你会看到我穿着它的样子，亲爱的，也会看到我脱掉它的样子。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「着た姿を見せてあげるよ、シャリーン。脱いだ姿もね」
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: 「着た姿を見せてあげるよ、シャリーン。脱いだ姿もね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous le montrerai volontiers, shereen, avec et sans la robe. »
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous le montrerai volontiers, shereen, avec et sans la robe. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr werdet mich mit dem Gewand sehen, Shereen, und ohne es."
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet mich mit dem Gewand sehen, Shereen, und ohne es."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

languages.text: "Beni üzerimde o kıyafetle göreceksin şirinim. Sonra da onsuz."
languages.original_text: "You'll see me in it, shereen, and out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Beni üzerimde o kıyafetle göreceksin şirinim. O olmadan da."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
